results.name: Number of divisions when calculating A084110(n).
comment: a(n) = 0 iff n is prime or a square of prime (A000430).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: g c x (d:ds) = if r > 0 then g c (x * d) ds else g (c + 1) x' ds
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 12 2003
